name: Butterfly Escape
description:
This is the first 3D Zuma style game in app store!

Butterfly Zuma is an addictive and exhilarating action-puzzle game, in which you charge through more then 100 scenic levels. Gameplay is similar to Zuma and Luxor; you guide Buka to shoot and destroy approaching balls of light before they reach Dungeon of Darkness. You can collect 5 cool power-ups, like pistols, mortar, lightning, gatling gun and of course ultimate power-up "Total Annihilation" aka Nuke!

Game features:
- Contains 110 levels totally
- Fully 3D graphics, this is the first 3D zuma style game
- Five magic skills
- Each chapter has a boss level
